reviewText: My home school kids have gone through many math books and online curricula.  This approach simplifies it for both the student and teacher.

This is a very basic and straight forward dvd about Math.  I am happy with it. It is a good value but I am really looking for something that is more indepth.  I am glad that I bought this one. Once my daughter has learned these topics, I will donate it to the local library.
